text: The 2017 Ohio Valley Conference Women's Basketball Tournament was held from March 1–4 at Nashville Municipal Auditorium in Nashville, Tennessee. ==Format== The OVC women's tournament is a traditional single-elimination eight-team tournament, seeded with the #8 seed facing the #1 seed in the first round, #7 facing #2, and so on. There is no reseeding, so if the #8 team were to defeat the #1 seed it would continue in the tournament playing the team which would have faced the #1 seed in the subsequent round (winner of #4 vs. #5). ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Seed !School !Conference !Overall !Tiebreaker |- | 1 | align=left| Belmont | 16–0 | 24–5 | |- | 2 | align=left| Morehead State | 11–5 | 21–8 | |- | 3 | align=left| SIU- Edwardsville | 9–7 | 13–16 | |- | 4 | align=left| Tenn-Martin | 8–8 | 11–18 | 1–1 vs. Austin Peay, 1–0 vs. Tenn Tech |- | 5 | align=left|Austin Peay | 8–8 | 14–15 | 1–1 vs. Tenn-Martin, 0–1 vs. Tenn Tech |- | 6 | align=left|Tennessee Tech | 7–9 | 10–19 | 3–1 EKU, SEMO & Murray State |- | 7 | align=left|Eastern Kentucky | 7–9 | 10–19 | 2–2 vs. Tenn Tech, SEMO, & Murray State, 1–0 vs. SEMO |- | 8 | align=left|Southeast Missouri State | 7–9 | 13–16 | 2–2 vs. Tenn Tech, EKU, & Murray State, 0–1 vs. EKU |} ==Bracket== ==See also== *2017 Ohio Valley Conference Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== ==External links== *2017 OVC Men's & Women's Basketball Championship Category:Ohio Valley Conference Women's Basketball Tournament Category:Basketball in Nashville, Tennessee Category:2016–17 Ohio Valley Conference women's basketball season
title: 2017 Ohio Valley Conference Women's Basketball Tournament
